mainBoard.name: Minas Tirith Garrison

rulings.text: If Minas Tirith Garrison is untapped as its last ability resolves, it can be tapped for its own last ability.

If an attacking Human is tapped for Minas Tirith Garrison's ability (perhaps because it has vigilance or it was untapped after being declared as an attacker), that Human remains an attacking creature.

You choose how many and which creatures to tap while Minas Tirith Garrison's last ability is resolving. No player may take any other actions between the time you make this choice and the time at which you draw cards.

mainBoard.text:
Minas Tirith Garrison's power is equal to the number of cards in your hand.
Whenever Minas Tirith Garrison attacks, you may tap any number of untapped Humans you control. Draw a card for each Human tapped this way.

Quand la Médecine ensorcelante arrive sur le champ de bataille, engagez la créature enchantée.
La créature enchantée a « Si cette créature devait se dégager pendant votre étape de dégagement, retirez-lui un marqueur +1/+1 à la place. Si vous faites ainsi, dégagez-la. » (Sinon, elle ne se dégage pas.)

foreignData.text:
Incanta creatura
Quando la Panacea Ammaliante entra nel campo di battaglia, TAPpa la creatura incantata.
La creatura incantata ha "Se questa creatura sta per STAPpare durante il tuo STAP, rimuovi invece un segnalino +1/+1 da essa. Se lo fai, STAPpala". (Altrimenti non STAPpa.)

エンチャントしているクリーチャーは「このクリーチャーがあなたのアンタップ・ステップにアンタップするなら、代わりに＋１/＋１カウンター１個を取り除く。そうしたなら、アンタップする。(そうでないなら、アンタップしない。)」を持つ。

mainBoard.name: Glorious Gale
mainBoard.originalText: Counter target creature spell. If it was a legendary spell, the Ring tempts you.

rulings.text: As the Ring tempts you, you get an emblem named The Ring if you don't have one. Then your emblem gains its next ability and you choose a creature you control to become (or remain) your Ring-bearer.
Each player can have only one emblem named The Ring and only one Ring-bearer at a time.
Each time the Ring tempts you, you must choose a creature if you control one.

If the creature you choose as your Ring-bearer was already your Ring-bearer, that still counts as choosing that creature as your Ring-bearer for the purpose of abilities that trigger "whenever you choose a creature as your Ring-bearer" or abilities that care about which creature was chosen as your Ring-bearer.

Some spells and abilities that cause the Ring to tempt you may require targets. If each target chosen is an illegal target as that spell or ability tries to resolve, it won't resolve. The Ring won't tempt you.
The Ring can tempt you even if you don't control a creature. In this case, abilities that trigger "whenever the Ring tempts you" will still trigger.
The Ring gains its abilities in order from top to bottom. Once it gains an ability, it has that ability for the rest of the game.

mainBoard.text: Counter target creature spell. If it was a legendary spell, the Ring tempts you.

foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Siempre que Meneldor, salvador veloz haga daño de combate a un jugador, exilia hasta una criatura objetivo de la cual eres propietario y luego regrésala al campo de batalla bajo tu control.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Alors venez ! Nous avons besoin d'aller plus vite que le vent, de rivaliser avec les ailes des Nazgûl. »
—Gandalf
foreignData.name: Meneldor, sauveur rapide
foreignData.text:
Vol
À chaque fois que Meneldor, sauveur rapide inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, exilez jusqu'à une créature ciblée que vous possédez, puis renvoyez-la sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Vieni a noi! Dobbiamo essere più veloci del vento, più delle ali dei Nazgûl."
—Gandalf
foreignData.name: Meneldor, Salvatore Repentino
foreignData.text:
Volare
Ogniqualvolta Meneldor, Salvatore Repentino infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, esilia fino a una creatura bersaglio che possiedi, poi rimettila sul campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo.

foreignData.flavorText:
「ならば来い！我らはナズグルの足より早く、疾風の如く駆けなければならない！」
――ガンダルフ
foreignData.name: 救いの疾翼、メネルドール
foreignData.text:
飛行
救いの疾翼、メネルドールがプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、あなたがオーナーであるクリーチャー最大１体を対象とする。それを追放する。その後、それをあなたのコントロール下で戦場に戻す。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 鳥・兵士

foreignData.flavorText:
"Então venham! Precisamos de velocidade maior que a de qualquer vento, superior às asas dos Nazgûl."
— Gandalf
foreignData.name: Meneldor, Salvador Célere
foreignData.text:
Voar
Toda vez que Meneldor, Salvador Célere, causar dano de combate a um jogador, exile até uma criatura alvo que você possui e depois devolva-a ao campo de batalha sob seu controle.

foreignData.flavorText:
「那就来吧！我们需要的速度得快过疾风，能超过那兹古尔的双翼。」
～甘道夫
foreignData.name: 迅捷救星美尼尔多
foreignData.text:
飞行
每当迅捷救星美尼尔多对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，放逐至多一个目标由你拥有的生物，然后将它在你的操控下移回战场。

mainBoard.name: Meneldor, Swift Savior
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Whenever Meneldor, Swift Savior deals combat damage to a player, exile up to one target creature you own, then return it to the battlefield under your control.

rulings.text: If a token is exiled this way, it will cease to exist and won't return to the battlefield.
Meneldor's second ability can target any permanent you own, including those another player controls.

Once the exiled permanent returns, it's considered a new object with no relation to the object that it was. Auras attached to the exiled permanent will be put into their owners' graveyards. Equipment attached to the exiled permanent will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled permanent will cease to exist.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
Whenever Meneldor, Swift Savior deals combat damage to a player, exile up to one target creature you own, then return it to the battlefield under your control.

mainBoard.flavorText: The black horses were filled with madness, and leaping forward in terror they bore their riders into the rushing flood.

foreignData.flavorText: Die schwarzen Rösser wurden von Wahnsinn ergriffen und sie sprangen mit ihren Reiter vorwärts in die reißenden Fluten.
foreignData.name: Flut der Bruinenfurt
foreignData.text: Bringe bis zu zwei Kreaturen deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurück. Hellsicht 1. Der Ring führt dich in Versuchung.

foreignData.flavorText: Los caballos negros se volvieron locos y, dominados por el terror, saltaron hacia adelante y precipitaron a los jinetes a las aguas violentas.
foreignData.name: Caballos del Bruinen
foreignData.text: Regresa hasta dos criaturas objetivo a las manos de sus propietarios. Adivina 1. El Anillo te tienta.

foreignData.flavorText: Les chevaux noirs furent pris de folie, et précipités en avant par leur peur, ils entraînèrent leurs cavaliers dans les flots déchaînés.
foreignData.name: Chevaux de la Bruinen
foreignData.text: Renvoyez jusqu'à deux créatures ciblées dans les mains de leurs propriétaires. Regard 1. L'Anneau vous tente.

foreignData.flavorText: I cavalli neri furono colti dal terrore e, in preda alla follia, portarono i loro cavalieri dritti verso l'inondazione.
foreignData.name: Cavalli del Bruinen
foreignData.text: Fai tornare fino a due creature bersaglio in mano ai rispettivi proprietari. Profetizza 1. L'Anello ti tenta.

foreignData.flavorText: 黒き馬たちは狂気に囚われ、恐れのあまり、襲い来る洪水に騎手諸共飛び込んでいった。
foreignData.name: ブルイネンの馬流し
foreignData.text: クリーチャー最大２体を対象とする。それらをオーナーの手札に戻す。占術１を行う。指輪があなたを誘惑する。

foreignData.flavorText: A loucura tomou os cavalos negros e, saltando adiante aterrorizados, eles carregaram seus cavaleiros para dentro da enxurrada.
foreignData.name: Cavalos do Bruinen
foreignData.text: Devolva até duas criaturas alvo para as mãos de seus donos. Vidência 1. O Anel tenta você.

foreignData.flavorText: 那些黑马全都发狂起来，惊恐地大步前冲，纷纷载着骑手一头扎进滚滚洪流当中。
foreignData.name: 布茹依能骏马
foreignData.text: 将至多两个目标生物移回其拥有者手上。占卜1。魔戒引诱你。

mainBoard.name: Horses of the Bruinen
mainBoard.originalText: Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands. Scry 1. The Ring tempts you.

rulings.text: As the Ring tempts you, you get an emblem named The Ring if you don't have one. Then your emblem gains its next ability and you choose a creature you control to become (or remain) your Ring-bearer.
Each player can have only one emblem named The Ring and only one Ring-bearer at a time.
Each time the Ring tempts you, you must choose a creature if you control one.

If the creature you choose as your Ring-bearer was already your Ring-bearer, that still counts as choosing that creature as your Ring-bearer for the purpose of abilities that trigger "whenever you choose a creature as your Ring-bearer" or abilities that care about which creature was chosen as your Ring-bearer.

Some spells and abilities that cause the Ring to tempt you may require targets. If each target chosen is an illegal target as that spell or ability tries to resolve, it won't resolve. The Ring won't tempt you.
The Ring can tempt you even if you don't control a creature. In this case, abilities that trigger "whenever the Ring tempts you" will still trigger.
The Ring gains its abilities in order from top to bottom. Once it gains an ability, it has that ability for the rest of the game.

mainBoard.text: Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands. Scry 1. The Ring tempts you.

foreignData.name: Das Badelied
foreignData.text:
(Je eine Sagenmarke beim Ins-Spiel-Kommen und nach deinem Ziehsegment. Opfern nach III.)
I, II — Ziehe zwei Karten und wirf dann eine Karte ab.
III — Mische eine beliebige Anzahl an Karten deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof in deine Bibliothek. Erzeuge {U}{U}.

foreignData.name: La canción de baño
foreignData.text:
(En cuanto esta Saga entre y después de tu paso de robar, agrega un contador de sabiduría. Sacrifícala después de III.)
I, II — Roba dos cartas, luego descarta una carta.
III — Baraja cualquier cantidad de cartas objetivo de tu cementerio en tu biblioteca. Agrega {U}{U}.

foreignData.name: La chanson de bain
foreignData.text:
(Au moment où cette saga arrive sur le champ de bataille et après votre étape de pioche, ajoutez un marqueur « sapience ». Sacrifiez après III.)
I, II — Piochez deux cartes, puis défaussez-vous d'une carte.
III — Mélangez n'importe quel nombre de cartes ciblées depuis votre cimetière dans votre bibliothèque. Ajoutez {U}{U}.

foreignData.name: La Canzone del Bagno
foreignData.text:
(Mentre questa Saga entra e dopo la tua sottofase di acquisizione, aggiungi un segnalino sapere. Sacrifica dopo III.)
I, II — Pesca due carte, poi scarta una carta.
III — Rimescola nel tuo grimorio un qualsiasi numero di carte bersaglio dal tuo cimitero. Aggiungi {U}{U}.

foreignData.name: 湯浴み歌
foreignData.text:
（この英雄譚が出た際とあなたのドロー・ステップの後に、伝承カウンター１個を加える。IIIの後に、生け贄に捧げる。）
I, II — カード２枚を引く。その後、カード１枚を捨てる。
III — あなたの墓地にある望む枚数のカードを対象とする。それらをあなたのライブラリーに加えて切り直す。{U}{U}を加える。
foreignData.type: エンチャント — 英雄譚

foreignData.name: A Canção do Banho
foreignData.text:
(Conforme esta Saga entra e após sua etapa de compra, adicione um marcador de conhecimento. Sacrifique-a após III.)
I, II — Compre dois cards e depois descarte um card.
III — Embaralhe qualquer número de cards alvo de seu cemitério em seu grimório. Adicione {U}{U}.

foreignData.name: 洗澡歌
foreignData.text:
（于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。到III后牺牲之。）
I, II — 抓两张牌，然后弃一张牌。
III — 将任意数量的目标牌从你的坟墓场洗入你的牌库。加{U}{U}。

mainBoard.name: The Bath Song
mainBoard.originalText:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I, II — Draw two cards, then discard a card.
III — Shuffle any number of target cards from your graveyard into your library. Add {U}{U}.

rulings.text: The Bath Song's final chapter ability is not a mana ability. It uses the stack and can be responded to.

You can choose no targets for The Bath Song's final chapter ability just to add {U}{U}. However, if you do choose targets, and all of those targets are illegal at the time the ability tries to resolve, the ability won't resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won't add {U}{U}.

mainBoard.text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I, II — Draw two cards, then discard a card.
III — Shuffle any number of target cards from your graveyard into your library. Add {U}{U}.
